tooltip.english: Delivers a strike to three adjacent tiles with ~lg~+/*Bodypart_Damage*/%~/~ Bodypart Damage and ~lg~+/*Bleeding_Chance*/%~/~ Bleed Chance.##Grants ~lg~+/*CTA*/%~/~ Counter Chance for ~w~5~/~ turns for each enemy hit by the strike.##The effect stacks up to ~w~3~/~ times.

Grants sword strikes ~lg~+7%~/~ Bleed Chance if the equipped ~w~sword's~/~ Durability is above ~w~80%~/~, ~lg~+5%~/~ Weapon Damage if it's above ~w~90%~/~, and ~lg~+3%~/~ Crit Chance if it's above ~w~95%~/~.##Reduces ~w~swords'~/~ Durability loss by ~w~50%~/~ when blocking with them and by ~w~25%~/~ when delivering strikes.
~w~Repositions~/~ to an adjacent tile.##Next turn delivers a free strike to a random adjacent enemy with ~lg~+/*Stagger_Chance*/%~/~ Stagger Chance and ~lg~+/*Crit_Chance*/%~/~ Crit Chance.

Grants sword strikes ~lg~+1.5%~/~ Crit Chance, ~lg~+3%~/~ Weapon Damage, and ~lg~+3%~/~ Energy Drain for each negative effect affecting the target.##~lg~Doubles~/~ the bonuses if the negative effect is ~r~Bleeding~/~.

Activates ~lg~"Fencer Stance"~/~ for ~w~10~/~ turns:##~lg~+5%~/~ Counter Chance#~lg~+5%~/~ Block Chance#~lg~+5%~/~ Dodge Chance#~lg~+8%~/~ Bleed Chance##Using the ability tree's skills grants an extra stack of the effect (up to ~w~IV~/~).##Basic sword strikes prolong the effect's duration by ~lg~1~/~ turn (up to ~w~10~/~) but reduce its number of stacks (no more than once per turn).##Only one ~w~Stance~/~ effect can be active at a time.

Using the ability tree's skills grants ~lg~+15%~/~ Energy Restoration for ~w~5~/~ turns and reduces the cooldown of the ability tree's random ~w~Attack~/~ skill by ~lg~1~/~ turn.##The effect stacks up to ~w~4~/~ times.
Sword hits grant ~lg~+6%~/~ Bleed Chance and ~lg~+4%~/~ Armor Penetration for ~w~5~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~5~/~ times.

Performs a ~w~charge~/~ towards the target and delivers a strike with ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+/*Armor_Piercing*/%~/~ Armor Penetration.##If the target takes damage, applies it with ~r~-/*Bleed_Debuff*/%~/~ Bleed Resistance and ~r~+/*Damage_Debuff*/%~/~ Damage Taken for ~w~4~/~ turns.

Performs a ~w~charge~/~ towards the target and delivers a strike with ~lg~+/*Stagger_Chance*/%~/~ Stagger Chance, ~lg~+/*Bodypart_Damage*/%~/~ Bodypart Damage, and ~lg~+/*Bleeding_Chance*/%~/~ Bleed Chance.##If the strike doesn't cause an ~r~Injury~/~, reduces the skill's cooldown by ~lg~4~/~ turns.
Causing ~r~Injuries~/~ with axe strikes reduces the ability tree's cooldowns by ~lg~1~/~ turn and replenishes ~bl~/*Regen_MP*/%~/~ Max Energy.

Applies the target with ~r~/*Block_Debuff*/%~/~ Block Chance and ~r~/*Block_Power_Debuff*/%~/~ Max Block Power for ~w~3~/~ turns.##Then delivers a strike with ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage, ~lg~+/*Armor_Piercing*/%~/~ Armor Penetration, and ~lg~+/*Armor_Damage*/%~/~ Armor Damage.##Each ~r~Bleeding~/~ and degree of ~r~Injury~/~ affecting the target grants the strike additional ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage_Add*/%~/~ Weapon Damage.
Grants axe strikes ~lg~+10%~/~ Weapon Damage if the target's Health is either ~r~100%~/~ or below ~r~50%~/~.

If the target isn't ~r~Injured~/~, axe strikes against it grant ~lg~+8%~/~ Bodypart Damage for ~w~5~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~3~/~ times.##Grants axe strikes ~lg~+4%~/~ Accuracy and ~lg~-4%~/~ Fumble Chance for each degree of ~r~Injury~/~ affecting the target.

Activates ~lg~"Massacre"~/~ for ~w~10~/~ turns:##~lg~+5%~/~ Armor Penetration#~lg~+10%~/~ Bodypart Damage#~lg~+5%~/~ Bleed Chance#~lg~+3%~/~ Crit Chance##Using the ability tree's skills grants an extra stack of the effect (up to ~w~IV~/~).##Basic axe strikes prolong the effect's duration by ~lg~1~/~ turn (up to ~w~10~/~) but reduce its number of stacks (no more than once per turn).##Only one ~w~Stance~/~ effect can be active at a time.

Delivers a strike to the target's head with ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage for each missing ~r~percent~/~ of the target's Health.##Grants the strike ~lg~+5%~/~ Crit Chance for each degree of ~r~Injury~/~ affecting the target and ~lg~+20%~/~ Crit Efficiency for each ~r~Bleeding~/~.##If the strike kills its target, replenishes ~bl~/*Regen_MP*/%~/~ Max Energy.
Damaging axe strikes apply their target with ~r~-7%~/~ Bleed Resistance and ~r~-5%~/~ Max Health for ~w~5~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~5~/~ times.

Applies the target with ~r~-/*Stun_Debuff*/%~/~ Control Resistance for ~w~3~/~ turns.##Then delivers a strike with ~lg~+/*Knockback_Chance*/%~/~ Knockback Chance.##If the strike ~w~knocks~/~ the target back, ~w~repositions~/~ to the emptied tile and delivers an additional strike with ~lg~+/*Daze_Chance*/%~/~ Daze Chance.##If the first strike doesn't ~w~knock~/~ the target back, reduces the skill's cooldown by ~lg~3~/~ turns.

Damaging mace strikes against ~w~Dazed~/~, ~w~Stunned~/~, or ~w~Staggered~/~ targets apply them with ~r~-5%~/~ Accuracy, ~r~+5%~/~ Fumble Chance and ~r~-5%~/~ Weapon Damage for ~w~6~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~3~/~ times.

Delivers a strike with ~lg~+/*Stagger_Chance*/%~/~ Stagger Chance, ~lg~+/*Armor_Piercing*/%~/~ Armor Penetration, and ~lg~+100%~/~ Armor Damage.##Grants the strike additional ~lg~+/*Daze_WD*/%~/~ Armor Damage for each turn of ~w~Daze~/~ affecting the target and ~lg~+/*Stun_WD*/%~/~ Armor Damage for each turn of ~w~Stun~/~.##If the target takes damage, applies it with ~r~+/*Damage_Debuff*/%~/~ Damage Taken and ~r~/*Move_Debuff*/%~/~ Move Resistance for ~w~3~/~ turns.##Reduces the ability tree's cooldowns by ~lg~2~/~ turns.

Grants mace strikes against ~w~Dazed~/~, ~w~Stunned~/~, or ~w~Staggered~/~ targets ~lg~+25%~/~ Bodypart Damage and ~lg~+5%~/~ Crit Chance.##Grants mace strikes ~lg~+5%~/~ Daze Chance and ~lg~+10%~/~ Stagger Chance for each degree of ~r~Injury~/~ affecting the target.
~w~Dazing~/~, ~w~Stunning~/~, or ~w~Staggering~/~ targets with mace strikes replenishes ~bl~/*Regen_MP*/%~/~ Max Energy.

Activates ~lg~"Hammer and Anvil"~/~ for ~w~10~/~ turns:##~lg~-3%~/~ Fumble Chance#~lg~+25%~/~ Armor Damage#~lg~+10%~/~ Daze Chance#~lg~+10%~/~ Stagger Chance##Using the ability tree's skills grants an extra stack of the effect (up to ~w~IV~/~).##Basic mace strikes prolong the effect's duration by ~lg~1~/~ turn (up to ~w~10~/~) but reduce its number of stacks (no more than once per turn).##Only one ~w~Stance~/~ effect can be active at a time.

Delivers a strike to the target's head with ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage, ~lg~+/*Stagger_Chance*/%~/~ Stagger Chance, and ~lg~+/*CRT*/%~/~ Crit Chance.##Grants the strike additional ~lg~+/*Daze_WD*/%~/~ Weapon Damage for each turn of ~w~Daze~/~ affecting the target and ~lg~+/*Stun_WD*/%~/~ Weapon Damage for each turn of ~w~Stun~/~.##If the target takes damage, puts all its abilities on cooldown and prolongs its ~w~Daze~/~ by ~w~4~/~ turns and ~w~Stun~/~ by ~w~1~/~ turn.

If using the ability tree's ~w~Attack~/~ skill fails to ~w~Daze~/~, ~w~Stun~/~, or ~w~Stagger~/~ the target, applies it with ~r~-6%~/~ Control Resistance, ~r~-8%~/~ Move Resistance, and ~r~-10%~/~ Crit Avoidance for ~w~6~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~3~/~ times.

Successful dagger strikes reduce the ability tree's cooldowns by ~lg~1~/~ turn.##Switching to a loadout with an equipped ~w~dagger~/~ grants ~lg~+15%~/~ Counter Chance and ~lg~+5%~/~ Crit Chance for ~w~3~/~ turns.##The effect doesn't stack.

Delivers two strikes with ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+/*Bodypart_Damage*/%~/~ Bodypart Damage.##If the skill kills its target or both strikes deal damage, reduces the skill's cooldown by ~lg~3~/~ turns.

Delivers a strike with ~lg~+/*Armor_Piercing*/%~/~ Armor Penetration and ~lg~+/*Bleeding_Chance*/%~/~ Bleed Chance.##If the target is ~r~Injured~/~ or ~r~Bleeding~/~, applies it with ~r~"Gaping Wound"~/~ for ~w~10~/~ turns:##~r~+33%~/~ Abilities Energy Cost#~r~+33%~/~ Cooldowns Duration#~r~+10%~/~ Damage Taken#~w~/*Bleed_Debuff*/%~/~ chance to start ~r~Bleeding~/~ after using an ability.

Hitting targets with a dagger for the first time applies them with ~r~+33%~/~ Damage Taken for ~w~3~/~ turns.##Grants dagger strikes against ~w~Unaware~/~ or ~w~Confused~/~ targets ~lg~+25%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+25%~/~ Armor Penetration.##Thrown daggers deal ~lg~50%~/~ more damage.

With ~w~/*Move_Chance*/%~/~ chance ~w~swaps~/~ places with the target.##If the ~w~swap~/~ is successful, grants ~lg~+15%~/~ Counter Chance and ~lg~+25%~/~ Bleed Chance for ~w~2~/~ turns.##Then delivers a strike with ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage, ~lg~+/*Stagger_Chance*/%~/~ Stagger Chance, ~lg~+/*CRT*/%~/~ Crit Chance, and ~lg~+100%~/~ Energy Drain.
Damaging dagger strikes apply their targets with ~r~-5%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~r~+7.5%~/~ Cooldowns Duration for ~w~6~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~4~/~ times.

Activates ~lg~"Painful Stabs"~/~ for ~w~10~/~ turns:##~lg~+4%~/~ Crit Chance#~lg~+10%~/~ Crit Efficiency#~lg~+5%~/~ Weapon Damage#~lg~+12%~/~ Bleed Chance##Using the ability tree's skills grants an extra stack of the effect (up to ~w~IV~/~).##Basic dagger strikes prolong the effect's duration by ~lg~1~/~ turn (up to ~w~10~/~) but reduce its number of stacks (no more than once per turn).##Only one ~w~Stance~/~ effect can be active at a time.
Dagger strikes grant ~lg~+5%~/~ Counter Chance for ~w~6~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~4~/~ times.##Grants dagger counters ~lg~+33%~/~ Weapon Damage.

Critical dagger strikes grant ~lg~+4%~/~ Dodge Chance for ~w~8~/~ turns and apply their target with ~r~+5%~/~ Damage Taken and ~r~-5%~/~ Bleed Resistance for ~w~8~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~4~/~ times.

Delivers a strike to the target's body or head with ~lg~+/*Armor_Piercing*/%~/~ Armor Penetration, ~lg~+/*Bodypart_Damage*/%~/~ Bodypart Damage for each ~r~Bleeding~/~ affecting the target, and ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage for each missing ~r~percent~/~ of its Health.##If the strike kills its target, it doesn't take a turn and grants ~lg~+25%~/~ Crit Chance for ~w~4~/~ turns.

Delivers a strike to one of the target's hands with ~lg~+/*Bleeding_Chance*/%~/~ Bleed Chance and ~lg~+/*Bodypart_Damage*/%~/~ Bodypart Damage.##If the target takes damage, applies it with ~r~/*Move_Debuff*/%~/~ Move Resistance and ~r~/*Bleed_Debuff*/%~/~ Bleed Resistance for ~w~4~/~ turns.##~lg~Doubles~/~ the skill's effects if the target is ~w~Staggered~/~.##Successful two-handed sword counters reduce the skill's cooldown by ~lg~1~/~ turn.
Two-handed sword counters replenish ~bl~/*Regen_MP*/%~/~ Max Energy and grant ~lg~-10%~/~ Skills Energy Cost for ~w~2~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~2~/~ times.

Activates ~lg~"Parry"~/~ for ~w~3~/~ turns:##~lg~+/*PRR*/%~/~ Block Chance#~lg~+/*Block_Power*/%~/~ Max Block Power#~lg~+/*CTA*/%~/~ Counter Chance##~lg~Fully~/~ replenishes Block Power.##While affected by ~lg~"Parry"~/~, each blocked strike reduces the skill's cooldown by ~lg~2~/~ turns and grants ~lg~+20%~/~ Block Power Recovery for ~w~3~/~ turns, and each counter grants ~lg~+2%~/~ Crit Chance for ~w~5~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~4~/~ times.
Grants ~lg~+3%~/~ Crit Chance, ~lg~+5%~/~ Counter Chance, and ~lg~-5%~/~ Damage Taken for each adjacent enemy if there's more than one.##The effect stacks up to ~w~3~/~ times.

Activates ~lg~"Feast of Steel"~/~ for ~w~10~/~ turns:##~lg~+5%~/~ Counter Chance#~lg~-4%~/~ Fumble Chance#~lg~+5%~/~ Accuracy#~lg~+2.5%~/~ Crit Chance#Grants ~lg~+100%~/~ Stagger Chance to every ~w~third~/~ strike.##Using the ability tree's skills grants an extra stack of the effect (up to ~w~IV~/~).##Basic two-handed sword strikes prolong the effect's duration by ~lg~1~/~ turn (up to ~w~10~/~) but reduce its number of stacks (no more than once per turn).##Only one ~w~Stance~/~ effect can be active at a time.

Delivers a strike to five adjacent tiles with ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage, ~lg~+/*Stagger_Chance*/%~/~ Stagger Chance, and ~lg~+/*Bleeding_Chance*/%~/~ Bleed Chance.##Reduces the ability tree's cooldowns by ~lg~1~/~ turn for each enemy hit by the strike and replenishes ~bl~/*Regen_MP*/%~/~ Max Energy for each enemy ~w~Staggered~/~ by the strike.

Consecutive two-handed sword hits against the same target grant ~lg~+7%~/~ Stagger Chance and ~lg~+3%~/~ Counter Chance for ~w~5~/~ turns.##Each received strike grants ~lg~+3%~/~ Block Chance and ~lg~+5%~/~ Block Power Recovery for ~w~5~/~ turns.##Both effects stack up to ~w~3~/~ times.

Two-handed sword hits against ~w~Staggered~/~ targets grant ~lg~+10%~/~ Bodypart Damage and ~lg~+10%~/~ Bleed Chance for ~w~5~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~3~/~ times.##Killing enemies with two-handed swords prolongs the duration of ~lg~"Feast of Steel"~/~ and ~lg~"Parry"~/~ by ~lg~1~/~ turn.

Performs a ~w~charge~/~ towards the target and delivers a strike with ~lg~+/*Stagger_Chance*/%~/~ Stagger Chance.##Each tile traveled with the ~w~charge~/~ grants the strike ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+/*CRT*/%~/~ Crit Chance.

If the ability tree's skill kills its target, instantly refreshes its cooldown.##If the target survives, grants ~lg~+5%~/~ Weapon Damage for ~w~4~/~ turns for each adjacent enemy.##The effect stacks up to ~w~3~/~ times.

Delivers a strike with ~r~/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage, ~lg~+/*Bleeding_Chance*/%~/~ Bleed Chance, and ~lg~+/*Armor_Piercing*/%~/~ Armor Penetration.##Grants the strike a ~w~/*Pull_Chance*/%~/~ chance to ~w~pull~/~ the target if it's ~w~1~/~ tile away.##Deals damage to an ~w~additional~/~ body part besides the one hit by the strike.

Two-handed axe hits apply their targets with ~r~-10%~/~ Block Chance, ~r~-10%~/~ Block Power Recovery, and ~r~-15%~/~ Max Block Power for ~w~6~/~ turns.##If the target's Block Chance is ~w~0%~/~, two-handed axe strikes against it grant ~lg~-4%~/~ Fumble Chance for ~w~6~/~ turns.##Both effects stack up to ~w~5~/~ times.

Delivers a strike with ~lg~+/*Bodypart_Damage*/%~/~ Bodypart Damage and ~lg~+/*Crit_Chance*/%~/~ Crit Chance to one of the target's body parts with a minor or medium ~r~Injury~/~.##If the target has no ~r~Injuries~/~, delivers the strike to one of its limbs.##If the strike worsens an ~r~Injury~/~ or causes a new one, the target loses ~r~/*HP_Damage*/%~/~ Max Health, and the affected body part has ~w~/*Bleeding_Chance*/%~/~ chance to start ~r~Bleeding~/~.

Activates ~lg~"Rampage"~/~ for ~w~10~/~ turns:##~lg~-10%~/~ Skills Energy Cost#~lg~+4%~/~ Crit Chance#~lg~+15%~/~ Bleed Chance#~lg~-3%~/~ Fumble Chance#Every ~w~third~/~ strike deals additional damage equal to ~r~15%~/~ of the target's Max Health (but no more than ~w~/*Max_HP_Limit*/~/~).##Using the ability tree's skills grants an extra stack of the effect (up to ~w~IV~/~).##Basic two-handed axe strikes prolong the effect's duration by ~lg~1~/~ turn (up to ~w~10~/~) but reduce its number of stacks (no more than once per turn).##Only one ~w~Stance~/~ effect can be active at a time.
Critical two-handed axe strikes grant ~lg~-15%~/~ Skills Energy Cost for ~w~3~/~ turns and apply their target with ~r~+10%~/~ Damage Taken for ~w~3~/~ turns.##Both effects stack up to ~w~2~/~ times.

Grants two-handed axe strikes ~lg~+15%~/~ Bodypart Damage and ~lg~+4%~/~ Accuracy if the target's Health is above ~r~50%~/~.##Grants two-handed axe strikes ~lg~+10%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~-4%~/~ Fumble Chance if the target's Health is below ~r~50%~/~.

Delivers a strike with ~lg~+/*Knockback_Chance*/%~/~ Knockback Chance and ~lg~+/*Bodypart_Damage*/%~/~ Bodypart Damage for each ~r~Bleeding~/~ affecting the target and each missing ~r~20%~/~ of its Health.##With ~w~/*Bleeding_Chance*/%~/~ chance causes the target's ~r~Injured~/~ body parts to start ~r~Bleeding~/~.##Then replenishes ~bl~/*MP_Restore*/%~/~ Max Energy for each ~r~Bleeding~/~ and degree of ~r~Injury~/~ affecting the target.

Using ~w~"Rampage"~/~ grants ~lg~+10%~/~ Bodypart Damage, ~lg~+10%~/~ Crit Efficiency, and ~lg~-5%~/~ to the ability tree's Cooldowns Duration for ~w~8~/~ turns for each enemy within ~w~5~/~ tiles.##The effect stacks up to ~w~5~/~ times.

Delivers a strike to a ~w~3х2~/~ tile area with ~r~-200%~/~ Knockback Chance as well as ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+/*Armor_Piercing*/%~/~ Armor Penetration for each degree of ~r~Injury~/~ affecting the targets within the skill's area of effect.##This strike can't ~w~knock~/~ back its targets.##Hitting a target applies it with ~r~-5%~/~ Bleed Resistance for ~w~6~/~ turns for each enemy within the skill's area of effect.##The effect stacks up to ~w~6~/~ times.##If the strike kills at least one target, delivers it again to the same area (but no more than once).

Causing ~r~Injuries~/~ and ~r~Bleedings~/~ with two-handed axe strikes grants ~lg~+5%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+4%~/~ Crit Chance for ~w~5~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~3~/~ times.##Two-handed axe hits against targets affected by two or more ~r~Injuries~/~ replenish ~bl~/*Regen_MP*/%~/~ Max Energy.

Killing enemies with the ability tree's skills or critical two-handed mace strikes activates ~lg~"Mighty Swing"~/~ for ~w~1~/~ turn and grants ~lg~+15%~/~ Energy Restoration for ~w~4~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~2~/~ times.

Activates ~lg~"Mighty Swing"~/~ for ~w~1~/~ turn:##~lg~+40%~/~ Weapon Damage#~lg~+40%~/~ Stagger Chance#~lg~+20%~/~ Stun Chance#~lg~+40%~/~ Bodypart Damage#~lg~+40%~/~ Armor Damage#~r~-200%~/~ Counter Chance

Delivers a strike to three adjacent tiles with ~lg~+/*Knockback_Chance*/%~/~ Knockback Chance and ~lg~+/*Armor_Damage*/%~/~ Armor Damage.##Grants ~lg~-10%~/~ Skills Energy Cost for ~w~3~/~ turns for each target that is ~w~knocked~/~ back by the strike.##The effect stacks up to ~w~3~/~ times.##If affected by ~lg~"Mighty Swing"~/~, and the strike ~w~knocked~/~ the target back, puts its abilities on a ~r~2~/~ turns cooldown.

~w~Staggering~/~ or ~w~knocking~/~ targets back with two-handed mace strikes applies them with ~r~-5%~/~ Control Resistance, ~r~+5%~/~ Fumble Chance, and ~r~-10%~/~ Dodge Chance for ~w~4~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~3~/~ times.

Activates ~lg~"Striker Stance"~/~ for ~w~10~/~ turns:##~lg~+3%~/~ Crit Chance#~lg~+10%~/~ Knockback Chance#~lg~+10%~/~ Armor Penetration#~lg~+15%~/~ Stagger Chance#Grants ~lg~+100%~/~ Daze Chance to every ~w~third~/~ strike.##Using the ability tree's skills grants an extra stack of the effect (up to ~w~IV~/~).##Basic two-handed mace strikes prolong the effect's duration by ~lg~1~/~ turn (up to ~w~10~/~) but reduce its number of stacks (no more than once per turn).##Only one ~w~Stance~/~ effect can be active at a time.##If affected by ~lg~"Mighty Swing"~/~, using the skill delivers a strike to a random adjacent enemy.

Grants two-handed mace strikes ~lg~+35%~/~ Armor Damage if the target's Armor Durability is above ~w~50%~/~.##Grants two-handed mace strikes ~lg~+20%~/~ Bodypart Damage if the target ~w~has no Armor~/~ or its Armor Durability is below ~w~50%~/~.

Delivers a strike with ~r~-50%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+75%~/~ Immobilization Chance and also prolongs the target's ~r~Daze~/~, ~r~Stun~/~, and ~r~Stagger~/~ by ~w~1~/~ turn.##This strike can't ~w~knock~/~ back its targets.##If the next turn the target is adjacent, delivers a free strike to it with ~lg~+/*Crit_Chance*/%~/~ Crit Chance.##If the target is ~w~Immobilized~/~, ~w~Stunned~/~, ~w~Dazed~/~, or ~w~Staggered~/~, grants this strike ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage.##If the target is ~w~Stunned~/~, also ~lg~doubles~/~ the bonus to Crit Chance.##If affected by ~lg~"Mighty Swing"~/~, prolongs its duration by ~lg~1~/~ turn, and the first strike applies the target with ~r~-10%~/~ Crushing Resistance for ~w~3~/~ turns.

While affected by ~lg~"Striker Stance"~/~, killing enemies with two-handed maces replenishes ~bl~/*Regen_MP*/%~/~ Max Energy.##If affected by both ~lg~"Striker Stance"~/~ and ~lg~"Mighty Swing"~/~ at the same time, killing enemies with two-handed maces reduces the ability tree's cooldowns by ~lg~4~/~ turns and grants ~lg~+20%~/~ Stun Chance for ~w~3~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~2~/~ times.

Performs a ~w~charge~/~ towards the target and delivers a strike to its head with ~lg~+/*Stun_Chance*/%~/~ Stun Chance and ~lg~+/*Bodypart_Damage*/%~/~ Bodypart Damage.##If affected by ~lg~"Mighty Swing"~/~, grants the strike ~lg~+50%~/~ Stagger Chance and ~lg~+50%~/~ Immobilization Chance.

~w~Dazing~/~, ~w~Stunning~/~, or ~w~Staggering~/~ targets with two-handed mace strikes applies them with ~r~-15%~/~ Move Resistance, ~r~-10%~/~ Accuracy, and ~r~+10%~/~ Fumble Chance for ~w~4~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~2~/~ times.
Grants spear strikes against targets affected by ~w~Immobilization~/~ or ~r~"Net"~/~ ~lg~+10%~/~ Armor Penetration and ~lg~+15%~/~ Bodypart Damage.

Delivers a strike to one of the target's legs with ~lg~+/*CRT*/%~/~ Crit Chance.##If the target is adjacent, grants the strike ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+/*Knockback_Chance*/%~/~ Knockback Chance.##If the target is ~w~1~/~ tile away, grants the strike ~lg~+/*Bodypart_Damage*/%~/~ Bodypart Damage and ~lg~+/*Immob_Chance*/%~/~ Immobilization Chance.

Delivers a strike to a ~w~2х1~/~ tile area with ~lg~+/*Bodypart_Damage*/%~/~ Bodypart Damage, ~lg~+/*Armor_Piercing*/%~/~ Armor Penetration, and ~lg~+/*Bleeding_Chance*/%~/~ Bleed Chance.##If the target is affected by ~w~Immobilization~/~ or ~r~"Net"~/~ grants the strike ~r~-35%~/~ Weapon Damage, ~r~-100%~/~ Immobilization Chance, ~r~halves~/~ all other bonuses, and instantly refreshes the skill's cooldown.

Remaining on the same tile grants ~lg~-3%~/~ Cooldowns Duration, ~lg~+3%~/~ Weapon Damage, and ~lg~+3%~/~ Counter Chance for ~w~4~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~3~/~ times.##Moving to other tiles removes the effect (except when moving with ~w~Maneuvers~/~).

Activates ~lg~"Pikeman Stance"~/~ for ~w~10~/~ turns:##~lg~+5%~/~ Accuracy#~lg~+5%~/~ Bleed Chance#~lg~+15%~/~ Knockback Chance#~lg~+8%~/~ Immobilization Chance##Using the ability tree's skills grants an extra stack of the effect (up to ~w~IV~/~).##Remaining on the same tile prolongs the effect's duration by ~lg~1~/~ turn (up to ~w~10~/~), and basic spear strikes reduce its number of stacks (no more than once per turn).##Only one ~w~Stance~/~ effect can be active at a time.
Grants critical spear strikes ~lg~+20%~/~ Bodypart Damage.##Сritical spear strikes deal additional damage equal to ~w~10%~/~ of the target's Max Health (but no more than ~w~/*Max_DMG*/~/~).

Activates ~lg~"Determination"~/~ for ~w~2~/~ turns:##Delivers a free strike with ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+/*Bleeding_Chance*/%~/~ Bleed Chance to every enemy that moves to adjacent tiles.##If this strike does damage, replenishes ~bl~/*Regen_MP*/%~/~ Max Energy and applies the target with ~r~-20%~/~ Move Resistance for ~w~3~/~ turns.
Grants ~lg~+5%~/~ Weapon Damage, ~lg~+5%~/~ Immobilization Chance, and ~lg~+3%~/~ Crit Chance if there is only one adjacent enemy.##~lg~Doubles~/~ the bonuses if the adjacent tiles are empty.

~w~Repositions~/~ to an adjacent tile, replenishes ~w~/*Block_Power*/%~/~ Max Block Power, and reduces the ability tree's cooldowns by ~lg~1~/~ turn for each visible enemy within ~w~3~/~ tiles.##Activates ~lg~"Regroup"~/~ for ~w~10~/~ turns:##~lg~+5%~/~ Block Chance#~lg~+5%~/~ Max Block Power#~lg~+15%~/~ Block Power Recovery#~lg~+5%~/~ Counter Chance##Grants an extra stack of the effect (up to ~w~IV~/~) for each ability tree's skill that was on cooldown before its activation.

When enemies move to adjacent tiles, applies them with ~r~-10%~/~ Piercing Resistance and ~r~-10%~/~ Crit Avoidance for ~w~4~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~2~/~ times.##Grants spear strikes against adjacent targets ~lg~+30%~/~ Knockback Chance.

Activates ~lg~"Taking Aim"~/~ for ~w~1~/~ turn:##~lg~+/*Hit_Chance*/%~/~ Accuracy#~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage#~lg~+1~/~ Range##Each enemy within ~w~4~/~ tiles additionally grants to the effect:##~lg~+/*Knockback_Chance*/%~/~ Knockback Chance#~lg~+/*Immob_Chance*/%~/~ Immobilization Chance#~lg~+/*Stagger_Chance*/%~/~ Stagger Chance##The bonus to Accuracy depends on the number of learned ~w~Ranged Weapons~/~ abilities.##Removes the effect if not equipped with a ~w~ranged weapon~/~.

Reduces the distance penalty to Accuracy (from ~r~-2%~/~ per tile to ~r~-1%~/~).##Reduces the penalties to Accuracy when shooting over small (from ~r~-15%~/~ to ~r~-10%~/~) and medium-sized obstacles (from ~r~-30%~/~ to ~r~-20%~/~).##Reduces the Accuracy penalty to bows when shooting at adjacent targets (from ~r~-50%~/~ to ~r~-35%~/~) and targets that are ~w~1~/~ tile away (from ~r~-25%~/~ to ~r~-15%~/~).

Killing enemies with melee strikes activates ~lg~"Taking Aim"~/~ for ~w~1~/~ turn the next time the character switches to a loadout with an equipped ~w~ranged weapon~/~ (if the weapon is a ~w~crossbow~/~, also instantly reloads it).##If equipped with a ~w~ranged weapon~/~, switching to another loadout doesn't take a turn.##Reduces the chance of bolts and arrows breaking upon hitting their target (from ~r~50%~/~ to ~r~25%~/~).

Increases Dodge Chance to ~lg~100%~/~ until the next turn and allows the character to perform a ~w~charge~/~ within ~w~2~/~ tiles.##Then takes a shot at the closest target (prioritizing enemies) with ~r~/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+/*Immob_Chance*/%~/~ Immobilization Chance.##Hitting the target grants ~lg~+/*MP_Restoration*/%~/~ Energy Restoration and ~lg~+/*EVS*/%~/~ Dodge Chance for ~w~5~/~ turns and reduces cooldowns of all skills by ~lg~1~/~ turn.

Grants ~lg~+5%~/~ Armor Penetration and ~lg~+5%~/~ Bodypart Damage to ~lg~"Taking Aim"~/~.##Using ~w~"Taking Aim"~/~ applies all targets within Vision with ~r~-5%~/~ Physical Resistance for ~w~4~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~2~/~ times.

Marks a tile (~w~2~/~ different tiles or the same tile ~w~twice~/~ if equipped with a ~w~bow~/~). ##Then takes a shot at them with ~r~/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+/*Daze_Chance*/%~/~ Daze Chance.##Applies damaged targets with ~r~/*PRR*/%~/~ Block Chance and ~r~+/*FMB*/%~/~ Fumble Chance for ~w~5~/~ turns.##If the same target wasn't marked twice, ~lg~doubles~/~ the applied penalties' duration.##If equipped with a ~w~crossbow~/~, instantly reloads it and ~lg~doubles~/~ the applied penalties.

Activates ~lg~"Suppression"~/~ for ~w~12~/~ turns (~w~15~/~ turns if equipped with a ~w~crossbow~/~):##~lg~+5%~/~ Immobilization Chance#~lg~+10%~/~ Knockback Chance#~lg~+10%~/~ Bleed Chance#~lg~-5%~/~ Cooldowns Duration#~lg~-5%~/~ Skills Energy Cost##Using the ability tree's skills (except ~w~"Taking Aim"~/~) grants an extra stack of the effect (up to ~w~IV~/~).##Basic shots prolong the effect's duration by ~lg~1~/~ turn (up to ~w~15~/~) but reduce its number of stacks (no more than once per turn).##Only one ~w~Stance~/~ effect can be active at a time.

Damaging shots apply all targets within Vision with ~r~-2%~/~ Dodge Chance, ~r~+2%~/~ Fumble Chance, ~r~-2%~/~ Accuracy, and ~r~-2%~/~ Crit Chance for ~w~10~/~ turns.##Each missed shot grants ~lg~+2%~/~ Accuracy for ~w~6~/~ turns.##Both effects stack up to ~w~5~/~ times.##If equipped with a ~w~crossbow~/~, both effects trigger twice per shot.

Takes a shot with ~lg~+1~/~ Range.##Each tile of distance to the target grants the shot ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage, ~lg~+/*Armor_Piercing*/%~/~ Armor Penetration, and ~lg~+/*Bodypart_Damage*/%~/~ Bodypart Damage.##If the target isn't ~w~hostile~/~, ~lg~doubles~/~ all distance-related bonuses and, upon hitting the target, with ~w~/*Confuse_Chance*/%~/~ chance ~w~Confuses~/~ it for ~w~10~/~ turns.

Grants ~lg~+5%~/~ Accuracy to the ability tree's ~w~Attack~/~ skills.##While affected by ~lg~"Taking Aim"~/~, hitting targets with shots reduces the ability tree's cooldowns by ~lg~1~/~ turn and grants ~lg~+5%~/~ Weapon Damage for ~w~8~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~4~/~ times.##If equipped with a ~w~crossbow~/~, both effects trigger twice per shot.

Activates ~lg~"Thrill of the Hunt"~/~ for ~w~15~/~ turns:##~lg~+10%~/~ Bodypart Damage#~lg~+3%~/~ Crit Chance#~lg~+10%~/~ Crit Efficiency##Applies the target with ~r~"Hunter's Mark"~/~ for ~w~15~/~ turns:##~r~-10%~/~ Bleed Resistance#~r~-10%~/~ Move Resistance#~r~-10%~/~ Control Resistance##Then takes a shot at the target. While affected by ~lg~"Thrill of the Hunt"~/~, damaging shots apply their target with ~r~"Hunter's Mark"~/~ or with an extra stack of the effect (up to ~w~IV~/~).##Killing targets affected by ~r~"Hunter's Mark"~/~ or applying it to new targets grants an extra stack of ~lg~"Thrill of the Hunt"~/~ (up to ~w~IV~/~).##Switching to another loadout doesn't remove the effects.

Grants all shots ~lg~+10%~/~ Crit Efficiency, ~lg~+12%~/~ Bodypart Damage, and ~lg~+5%~/~ Armor Penetration for each missing ~r~20%~/~ of the target's Health.##Grants all shots ~lg~+3%~/~ Crit Chance for each degree of ~r~Injury~/~ and each ~r~"Net"~/~, ~r~"Web"~/~, ~w~Stagger~/~, and ~w~Immobilization~/~ affecting the target.

Takes a shot at the target's head with ~lg~+/*Bodypart_Damage*/%~/~ Bodypart Damage, ~lg~+/*CRT*/%~/~ Crit Chance, and ~lg~+/*CRTD*/%~/~ Crit Efficiency.##If the shot kills its target, replenishes ~bl~/*Regen_MP*/%~/~ Max Energy, instantly reloads the equipped ~w~crossbow~/~, and activates ~lg~"Taking Aim"~/~ for ~w~1~/~ turn.

While affected by ~lg~"Suppression"~/~, grants an extra stack of ~lg~"Thrill of the Hunt"~/~ when using ~w~"Hunter's Mark"~/~.##At the end of the turn, grants an extra stack of ~lg~"Suppression"~/~ for each target affected by ~r~"Hunter's Mark"~/~ within Vision.##Grants melee strikes against targets affected by ~r~"Hunter's Mark"~/~ ~lg~+20%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+5%~/~ Crit Chance.

Grants ~lg~-15%~/~ to the equipped ~w~armor~/~ and ~w~weapons'~/~ Durability loss rate.##Allows dismantling pieces of armor into ~w~fragments~/~, which can be used to repair other armor, and also occasionally receive them as loot when killing enemies.#The chance to receive fragments depends on the target's ~w~Armor Durability~/~ upon its death.##Increases the amount of Durability restored by repair kits by ~lg~33%~/~.##Each equipped ~w~piece of armor~/~ with Durability above ~w~80%~/~ grants ~lg~+5%~/~ Bleed Resistance to the respective body part and ~lg~+3%~/~ Crit Avoidance.

Activates ~lg~"Brace for Impact!"~/~ for ~w~2~/~ turns:##~lg~+12%~/~ Dodge Chance#~lg~+12%~/~ Block Chance#Grants all received strikes and shots, ~r~+/*FMB*/%~/~ Fumble Chance, ~r~/*Hit_Chance*/%~/~ Accuracy, and ~r~/*AP*/%~/~ Armor Penetration.##If equipped with a ~w~light chestpiece~/~, grants the effect ~lg~+50%~/~ Crit Avoidance.##If equipped with a ~w~medium chestpiece~/~, also grants received strikes and shots ~r~-33%~/~ Bodypart Damage.##If equipped with a ~w~heavy chestpiece~/~, grants the skill ~lg~-25%~/~ Cooldown Duration.

Each shot taken at the character grants ~lg~+5%~/~ Dodge Chance for ~w~5~/~ turns and applies the attacker with ~r~-8%~/~ Accuracy for ~w~5~/~ turns.##Both effects stack up to ~w~4~/~ times and trigger twice if the shot hits its target.##Grants all received strikes and shots ~r~-10%~/~ Armor Penetration.

Delivers a strike to three adjacent tiles with ~r~/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage and ~lg~+/*Stagger_Chance*/%~/~ Stagger Chance.##Hitting a target applies it with ~r~-20%~/~ Weapon Damage, ~r~+20%~/~ Fumble Chance, and ~r~-5%~/~ Accuracy for ~w~2~/~ turns.##If equipped with a ~w~light chestpiece~/~, grants additional ~lg~+1~/~ turn to the applied penalties' duration.##If equipped with a ~w~medium chestpiece~/~, hitting a target applies it with ~r~-15%~/~ Control Resistance, ~r~-15%~/~ Move Resistance, and ~r~-15%~/~ Crit Avoidance for ~w~2~/~ turns.##If equipped with a ~w~heavy chestpiece~/~, replenishes ~bl~/*Regen_MP*/%~/~ Max Energy and grants ~lg~+6%~/~ Energy Restoration for ~w~5~/~ turns for each enemy hit by the strike.

Using ~w~Stances~/~ and ~w~Maneuvers~/~ grants ~lg~-10%~/~ Damage Taken until the next turn.##If equipped with a ~w~light chestpiece~/~, moving to other tiles (~w~Charges~/~ and ~w~Maneuvers~/~ count as well) grants ~lg~+2%~/~ Dodge Chance and ~lg~+2%~/~ Counter Chance for ~w~4~/~ turns for each traveled tile.##If equipped with a ~w~medium chestpiece~/~, using ~w~Stances~/~ and ~w~Maneuvers~/~ also reduces this ability tree's cooldowns by ~lg~1~/~ turn.##If equipped with a ~w~heavy chestpiece~/~, remaining on the same tile grants ~lg~-3%~/~ Abilities Energy Cost and ~lg~+3%~/~ Crit Avoidance for ~w~6~/~ turns.##All effects stack up to ~w~5~/~ times.

~w~Repositions~/~ to an adjacent tile and activates ~lg~"Unyielding Defense"~/~ for ~w~8~/~ turns:##~lg~+6%~/~ to all body parts' Protection (no less than ~lg~+1~/~)#~lg~+4%~/~ Fortitude#~lg~+4%~/~ Block Power Recovery#~lg~+4%~/~ Block Chance or ~lg~+4%~/~ Dodge Chance (the priority is given to the highest Stat)##Each received strike or shot grants an extra stack of the effect (up to ~w~V~/~).

Performs a ~w~charge~/~ towards the target and deals ~w~/*Blunt_Damage*/~/~ Crushing Damage with ~w~/*Hit_Chance*/%~/~ Accuracy and ~w~/*Stagger_Chance*/%~/~ Stagger Chance.##The damage depends on the equipped ~w~chestpiece's~/~ Protection.##If equipped with a ~w~light chestpiece~/~, grants the skill ~lg~+1~/~ Range and also grants ~lg~+/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage for ~w~2~/~ turns.##If equipped with a ~w~medium chestpiece~/~ and the skill ~w~Staggers~/~ its target, grants ~lg~-25%~/~ Cooldowns Duration for ~w~2~/~ turns.##If equipped with a ~w~heavy chestpiece~/~, grants the skill ~r~-1~/~ Range and replaces the Stagger Chance with ~w~/*Stun_Chance*/%~/~ Stun Chance.

Each equipped piece of ~w~light armor~/~ grants ~lg~+15%~/~ to the respective body part's Protection (no less than ~lg~+1~/~).##Each equipped piece of ~w~medium armor~/~ grants ~lg~+5%~/~ Bleed Resistance to the respective body part and ~lg~+1.5%~/~ Dodge Chance.##Each equipped piece of ~w~heavy armor~/~ grants ~lg~-2%~/~ to its Durability loss rate and also ~bl~+3~/~ Max Energy and ~lg~+1%~/~ Energy Restoration.##~lg~Doubles~/~ the bonuses if each equipped piece of armor belongs to the same class.

Applies the target with ~r~"Wormhole"~/~ for ~w~3~/~ turns and marks its tile.##When the effect expires or is removed, ~w~teleports~/~ the target to the marked tile, dealing ~p~/*Arcane_Damage*/ Arcane Damage~/~.##If the marked tile is occupied, ~w~teleports~/~ the target to the closest empty tile, dealing additional ~p~/*Arcane_Damage_Add*/ Arcane Damage~/~ and with ~w~/*Stun_Chance*/%~/~ chance ~w~Stunning~/~ it.##While ~r~"Wormhole"~/~ is active, the spell doesn't go on cooldown and can be used again without spending Energy to remove the effect from the target.##The spell can't be used on giant or stationary targets and doesn't harm the caster.

Marks two targets, then ~w~teleports~/~ them, swapping their positions.##Deals ~p~/*Arcane_Damage*/ Arcane Damage~/~ to both targets for each tile of distance between them, and with ~w~/*Debuff_Chance*/%~/~ chance ~w~Confuses~/~ them for ~w~3~/~ turns or ~w~Dazes~/~ for ~w~2~/~ turns.##Applies both targets with ~r~/*Weapon_Damage*/%~/~ Weapon Damage, ~r~/*Hit_Chance*/%~/~ Accuracy, and ~r~/*FMB*/%~/~ Fumble Chance for ~w~3~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~2~/~ times.##The spell can't be used on giant or stationary targets, doesn't harm the caster, and doesn't apply penalties to their allies.

Dealing ~p~Arcane Damage~/~ with strikes, shots, and spells grants ~lg~+2%~/~ Accuracy, ~lg~-2%~/~ Fumble Chance, ~lg~-2%~/~ Backfire Chance, ~lg~+2%~/~ Crit Chance, and ~lg~+2%~/~ Miracle Chance for ~w~4~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~3~/~ times.##~w~Teleporting~/~ grants ~lg~+1~/~ Range to ~w~Arcanistics~/~ spells for ~w~4~/~ turns and ~lg~-15%~/~ Backfire Damage Change for ~w~2~/~ turns.

When ~r~"Wormhole"~/~ expires or is removed after being applied to the character, replenishes ~w~33%~/~ Health and Energy lost over the course of the effect.##When ~r~"Wormhole"~/~ expires or is removed after being applied to an enemy, deals additional ~p~Arcane Damage~/~ equal to ~w~33%~/~ of the damage they received over the course of the effect.

Deals ~p~/*Arcane_Damage*/ Arcane Damage~/~ to a ~w~5x5~/~ tile area (except the central tile) and with ~w~/*Debuff_Chance*/%~/~ chance ~w~Staggers~/~ or ~w~Immobilizes~/~ all affected targets.##With ~w~/*Knockback_Chance*/%~/~ chance ~w~knocks~/~ back the targets adjacent to the area's center and ~w~pulls~/~ the targets that are ~w~1~/~ tile away from it.##The spell doesn't harm the caster, aside from ~p~Arcane Damage~/~.

~w~Teleporting~/~ enemies burns ~bl~/*Energy_Burn*/%~/~ of their Max Energy and replenishes the same amount of Energy to the character.##Using ~w~"Dimensional Shift"~/~ on the character or entities summoned with ~w~Arcanistics~/~ reduces the spell's cooldown by ~lg~2~/~ turns.

Activates ~lg~"Aether Shield"~/~ for ~w~3~/~ turns:##~lg~/*Control_Res*/%~/~ Control Resistance#~lg~/*Move_Res*/%~/~ Move Resistance#~lg~/*Bleed_Res*/%~/~ Bleed Resistance#~lg~/*Damage_Taken*/%~/~ Damage Taken#Replenishes Energy for ~w~33%~/~ of the damage received.#~w~Destroys~/~ all physical and magical projectiles (including thrown items) that would hit the caster, preventing their damage and effects.#~w~Colliding~/~ with targets deals additional ~p~Arcane Damage~/~ to them.##While affected by ~lg~"Aether Shield"~/~, ~w~teleporting~/~ prolongs the effect's duration by ~lg~3~/~ turns (up to ~w~6~/~), and grants all strikes and shots ~p~/*Arcane_Damage*/ Arcane Damage~/~ for ~w~4~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~2~/~ times.

If ~w~"Schism"~/~ (or ~w~"Arcane Tether"~/~ of the summoned ~w~Phantasm~/~) successfully ~w~knocks~/~ back or ~w~pulls~/~ the target, applies it with ~r~-10%~/~ Magic Resistance and ~r~-10%~/~ Arcane Resistance for ~w~3~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~2~/~ times.##If these spells fail to ~w~knock~/~ back or ~w~pull~/~ the target, deals ~p~/*Arcane_Damage*/ Arcane Damage~/~ to it instead.

Summons a ~w~Mana Crystal~/~ on the targeted tile, which persists for ~w~8~/~ turns.##Each turn, the ~w~Crystal~/~ shoots a bolt of Aether at the enemy with the lowest Health within ~w~/*Range*/~/~ tiles, dealing ~p~/*Arcane_Damage*/ Arcane Damage~/~ with ~w~/*Hit_Chance*/%~/~ Accuracy, ~w~/*Armor_Piercing*/%~/~ Armor Penetration, ~w~/*CRT*/%~/~ Crit Chance, and ~w~/*CRTD*/%~/~ Crit Efficiency.##The offensive capabilities and Max Health of the ~w~Crystal~/~ change dynamically depending on the caster's stats.#The ~w~Crystal~/~ doesn't move and is immune to all effects (except ~r~"Stasis"~/~ and ~r~"Wormhole"~/~).##When ~w~teleported~/~, the ~w~Crystal~/~ shoots ~w~3~/~ bolts at random enemies within ~w~/*Range*/~/~ tiles, distributing them evenly.

Applies the target with ~r~"Stasis"~/~ for ~w~3~/~ turns:##~lg~+200%~/~ Move Resistance#~lg~-50%~/~ Damage Taken#Immunity to all damage types except ~p~Arcane~/~.#Immunity to all effects except ~r~"Wormhole"~/~.#~r~Can't perform any actions~/~.#Prevents ~w~death~/~.#~w~Freezes~/~ all cooldowns and the duration of active effects.##When the effect expires or is removed, deals ~w~/*Total_Damage*/%~/~ of the ~p~Arcane Damage~/~ the target received over the course of ~r~"Stasis"~/~ to a ~w~3x3~/~ tile area, and with ~w~/*Daze_Chance*/%~/~ chance ~w~Dazes~/~ all affected targets.##~w~Teleporting~/~ a target affected by ~r~"Stasis"~/~ removes the effect and ~w~doubles~/~ the chance to ~w~Daze~/~.##The spell can't be used on giant targets.

Summons a ~w~Phantasm~/~ on the targeted tile, which persists for ~w~8~/~ turns.##Each turn, the ~w~Phantasm~/~ deals ~p~/*Arcane_Damage*/ Arcane Damage~/~ to a random adjacent enemy with ~w~/*Hit_Chance*/%~/~ Accuracy, ~w~/*Armor_Piercing*/%~/~ Armor Penetration, ~w~/*CRT*/%~/~ Crit Chance, and ~w~/*CRTD*/%~/~ Crit Efficiency.##The offensive capabilities and Max Health of the ~w~Phantasm~/~ change dynamically depending on the caster's stats.#The ~w~Phantasm~/~ can move within ~w~2~/~ tiles of its summoning or ~w~teleportation~/~ spot, is immune to all effects (except ~r~"Stasis"~/~ and ~r~"Wormhole"~/~), and replenishes Health upon taking ~p~Arcane Damage~/~.##The ~w~Phantasm~/~ has access to the following abilities: ~w~"Arcane Tether"~/~, which ~w~pulls~/~ enemies in, ~w~"Mana Siphon"~/~, which steals Energy, and ~w~"Consonance"~/~, which prolongs its summoning duration.##~w~Teleporting~/~ the ~w~Phantasm~/~ instantly refreshes all its cooldowns.

~w~Teleporting~/~ a ~w~Mana Crystal~/~ grants it ~lg~+1~/~ Range, ~lg~+25%~/~ Damage, ~lg~+10%~/~ Accuracy, and ~lg~+25%~/~ Damage Reflection for ~w~3~/~ turns.##The effect stacks up to ~w~2~/~ times.##Each strike received by entities summoned with ~w~Arcanistics~/~ deals ~p~Arcane Damage~/~ to the attacker equal to ~w~10%~/~ of the entities' Max Health.

Once per ~w~10~/~ turns, producing a miracle with ~w~"Mana Crystal"~/~ instantly refreshes the spell's cooldown and grants it ~lg~-30%~/~ Energy Cost during the next use.##Each entity currently summoned with ~w~Arcanistics~/~ grants ~lg~-5%~/~ Backfire Damage Change and ~lg~+10%~/~ Magic Power.

When ~r~"Stasis"~/~ expires or is removed after being applied to the character, it no longer harms them and also activates ~lg~"Intangibility"~/~ for ~w~1~/~ turn, making them untargetable by strikes, shots, and spells.##While ~r~"Stasis"~/~ is active on the character, grants the effect ~lg~+50%~/~ Arcanistics Power, ~lg~+25%~/~ Miracle Chance, and prevents it from ~w~freezing~/~ cooldowns.
